subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Today's N.B.A. players are bigger and richer, but in a lot of ways they remind me of the tough guys who used to swarm all over the Garden or the Armory on Saturday afternoons.
snippet: Today's N.B.A. players are bigger and richer, but in a lot of ways they remind me of the tough guys who used to swarm all over the Garden or the Armory on Saturday afternoons.
